Buscalan is one of my favorite villages to visit. It is very friendly and the hike up is breath taking.
You will need to get a guide either in Sagada or Bontoc. I recommend using Francis Pain in Bontoc as he speaks the local language while guides from Sagada do not. You will take a jeepney from
for about an hour then hike another 40 minutes mostly uphill.

value: content=Truly an amazing woman and the clear highlight of the small town. She does many different tattoos. Be warned the technique she uses can be painful but you will get a unique souvenir from your visit to the Kalinga Mountains.

If you bring any live chickens up there they will be happy to slaughter it and serve it to you. The people are very accommodating and if you stay the night will likely cook you supper and make coffee.
